Supervised learning assumes underlying structure

Last updated on April 15, 2021

Supervised learning assumes that outputs are a function of inputs combined with noise. A “good model” estimates the original function with high accuracy. Loss formalizes this mismatch.

Resources

  • https://www.ai.rug.nl/minds/uploads/LN_NN_RUG.pdf
